{{Infobox person | name = Tanner Maguire | image = | birth_date = Tanner James Maguire
{{birth date and age|1998|7|15}} | birth_place = [[Scottsdale, Arizona]], U.S. | occupation = Actor | yearsactive = 2005âpresent }} '''Tanner James Maguire''' (born July 15, 1998) is an American [[child actor]]. He appears in the film ''[[Janie (2006 film)|Janie]]''. He is most famous for his roles in ''[[Letters to God]]''http://images.google.ca/imgres?imgurl=http://www.ultimatedisney.com/dvdizzy/images/q-s/savingsarahcain-cov.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.ultimatedisney.com/dvdizzy/savingsarahcain.html&usg=__fhPUrcrgzezLD2Hus7_r-vyyFw4=&h=225&w=161&sz=19&hl=en&start=31&um=1&tbnid=Z5crJsypSNHJyM:&tbnh=108&tbnw=77&prev=/images%3Fq%3Dtanner%2Bmaguire%26ndsp%3D20%26hl%3Den%26rlz%3D1T4DBCA_enCA203CA203%26sa%3DN%26start%3D20%26um%3D1 and, earlier, in ''[[Saving Sarah Cain]]'', in which he plays the older brother of [[Bailee Madison|Hannah Cottrell]], Josiah Cottrell. His sister, [http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2210902/ Payton Maguire], also acts. ==Career== Born in [[Scottsdale, Arizona]], Tannerâs interest in acting began at the age of three after a visit to the local community theater to see ''[[Peter Pan]]''.http://www.letterstogodthemovie.com/the-movie/cast/ By the time he was six, he had gone on to perform in nine different productions on stage. Tanner began to express interest in not only being in front of an audience but also being in front of a camera. His family relocated to Los Angeles and immediately Tanner began to work in television appearing on numerous popular shows, proving the move successful. Maguire has appeared in several national commercials for major companies including K-Mart, Subway and Brinks Home Security. Tanner donated an autographed bandanna from the movie ''[[Letters to God]]'' to Brendan Hogan, a young boy with brain cancer.http://www.carepages.com/carepages/BrendanHogan/updates/2698927 ==Filmography== {| class=wikitable |- !
